activities.name: DELETE_SILVER_TAXI_ZONE
activities.description:
this will delete the parquet file in silver/taxi_zone/*.parquet

this doesn't delete the external table created on top of this file.

activities.name: CREATE_SILVER_TAXI_ZONE
activities.description:
This will first delete the external table then 
create new ext table using CETAS where data will be copied to silver layer

scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT *
  FROM bronze.taxi_zone;
